description.displayText: Maria is a sweet person, who is especially patient with children. She babysat my five year old daughter. My daughter enjoyed her time with Maria, I believe it's because of the special attention she offered to her. My daughter felt as if she had another friend. They would do activities such as going to the park, going on walks, homework, eating out, etc.
